ygData.subject: Re: Some races/places have all the luck
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is because you re not a weight obsessed monk who has dreams of being fully armored and under 15 lbs. To be a bit more fair, gloves tend to be the real
ygData.messageBody:
Mark Bourland wrote:
>
> From: "Mark Bourland" <bourland@...>
>
> Speaking of Trolls and their cloth armor collected from level 1 kills, I
> found a magic netted shirt that was 4AC. This was equivalent of the AC on
> my guild tunic but when I offered it to a merchant, they were ready to buy
> it from me for 8 gold. I still don't know what's magical about it though.
> It doesn't improve any skills or stats that I can see.

This is because you're not a weight obsessed monk who has dreams of
being fully armored and under 15 lbs.
To be a bit more fair, gloves tend to be the real draw for monks at
first. They make your hand to hand attacks magical.

Josh
